channel.title: GBG Curriculum in Schools
channel.description:
Hi all, An FYI that I am gathering info towards a "GBG Launch Package' document. Goal: to provide a one stop document to launching a chapter.
I have started a 'GBG in the Schools' thread on the UD GBG facebook and am working with a few STEM associations to get ready for wide spread blasts of the curriculum.
I will occasionally post here and on facebook issues related to GBG in the Schools.
The first is about teen communication

item.title: GBG Curriculum in Schools
item.dc:creator: caverlyj
item.description:
We are writing a grant for funding for GBG in our school. A curriculum component would be very helpful to include. Can you send me a link to your curriculum? Even a draft copy would give me a place to start. Thank you so much!

Read full topic

item.description:
